Package smartblocks.object

Interface Summary
MovingObject Interface implemented by all objects to be used in the simulation
 

Class Summary
DiscMass A mass with a disc-like shape moving over the smart surfaces
ObjectFactory A factory of moving objects implemented as a singleton
ObjectFactory.SingletonHolder SingletonHolder is loaded on the first execution of Singleton.getInstance() or the first access to SingletonHolder.INSTANCE, not before.
ObjectImpl Default implementation of the MovingObject interface
PunctualMass A punctual mass moving over the smart surfaces
 

Enum Summary
EnumObjectParams Parameters of the moving objects supported by Smart Blocks Simulator
